public method PGML::show (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in show: 6
sub show {
  ClearWarnings;
  my $parser = PGML::Parse->new(shift);
  warn join("\n","==================","Errors parsing PGML:",@warnings,"==================\n") if scalar(@warnings);
  return $parser->{root}->show;
}

Reimplemented in PGML::Parse.

public method PGML::Warning (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in Warning: 8
sub Warning {
  my $warning = join("",@_);
  $warning =~ s/ at line \d+ of \(eval \d+\)//;
  $warning =~ s/ at \(eval \d+\) line \d+//;
  $warning =~ s/, at EOF$//;
  die $warning if $warningsFatal;
  push @warnings,$warning;
}
